short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Forget lorem ipsum - generate text you can actually read with AI

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
AI Ipsum generates placeholder text powered by AI. 

Unlike lorem ipsum, it creates meaningful content as dad jokes, programming puns, or general text. 

Features include word count control, themes, favorites, and copy to clipboard. 

Ideal for developers and designers who need engaging placeholder content in their projects.
